name: Blinkyhead
description:
This game was made for NinjaScruffinTuna's fanjam 2021!

Story - You play as Blinky, the guy who is fueled by electricity. His friend however, Clemorot, is fueled by nuclear power. And there is an evil scientist called Meklanen who wants to abuse Clemorot's power, so he stole him. Blinky foils Meklanen plans multiple times to find his friend, so Scientist decides to build a GIANT robot version of himself, to stop Blinky getting in his way. It is up to Blinky to save the day! (and to the player who plays this game lmao)

Controls - Directional arrows : move, Z : jump, X : shoot, C : activate super attack, Shift : dash.
